languages.text: Эльдары слишком напуганы и озлоблены на мон-кай за гибель своих сородичей, чтобы отвечать на сигналы после случившегося. Однако Ирлиэт уверена, что сможет убедить собратьев сотрудничать с элантах, если ей позволят поговорить с ними.

The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their kin to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is certain that she can convince them to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.
languages.original_text: Эльдары слишком напуганы и озлоблены на мон-кай за гибель своих сородичей, чтобы отвечать на сигналы после случившегося. Однако Ирлиэт уверена, что сможет убедить собратьев сотрудничать с элантах, если ей позволят поговорить с ними.

traits.locale_text: The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the deaths of their brethren to answer incoming signals after what happened. Despite this, Yrliet is convinced that she can convince her kin to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the deaths of their brethren to answer incoming signals after what happened. Despite this, Yrliet is convinced that she can convince her kin to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their brethren to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is convinced that she can convince her kin to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their brethren to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is convinced that she can convince her kin to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their kin to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is certain that she can convince them to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

languages.text: 由于最近发生了亲族遇难的事故，这些艾达灵族对猴子充满了恐惧、怨恨，甚至不敢为脱险而欢呼。但即便如此，伊莉耶特仍然相信，如果她能与她的亲族进行交流，她便能说服她的亲族与外界人合作。
languages.original_text: The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their kin to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is certain that she can convince them to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

traits.locale_text: 由于最近发生了亲族遇难的事故，这些艾达灵族对猴子充满了恐惧、怨恨，甚至不敢为脱险而欢呼。但即便如此，伊莉耶特仍然相信，如果她能与她的亲族进行交流，她便能说服她的亲族与外界人合作。

languages.text: アエルダリは同族の死についてモン＝ケイ恐れ、怒りを抱いている。それにもかかわらず、ユリエットは、話すことを許可されれば、自分のキンを説得してエランタに協力させることができると確信している。
languages.original_text: The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their kin to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is certain that she can convince them to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

traits.locale_text: アエルダリは同族の死についてモン＝ケイ恐れ、怒りを抱いている。それにもかかわらず、ユリエットは、話すことを許可されれば、自分のキンを説得してエランタに協力させることができると確信している。
アエルダリは同族の死についてモン＝ケイ恐れ、怒りを抱いている。それにもかかわらず、ユリエットは、話すことを許可されれば、自分のキンを説得してエランタに協力させることができると確信している。

languages.text: Los Aeldari están asustados y desconfían de los mon-keigh por los recientes ataques contra los suyos, de modo que no responden a las comunicaciones. A pesar de ello, Yrliet está segura de que puede convencerlos para que cooperen con su elantach si obtiene permiso para hablar con ellos.
languages.original_text: The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their kin to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is certain that she can convince them to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

traits.locale_text: Los Aeldari están asustados y desconfían de los mon-keigh por los recientes ataques contra los suyos, de modo que no responden a las comunicaciones. A pesar de ello, Yrliet está segura de que puede convencerlos para que cooperen con su elantach si obtiene permiso para hablar con ellos.

languages.text: Nach den jüngsten Verlusten ihrer Brüder haben die Aeldari Angst vor den Chem-Pan-Sey und empfinden Abscheu für sie. Sie weigern sich daher, eingehende Rufe zu beantworten. Dennoch ist Yrliet sicher, dass sie sie zu einer Kooperation mit dem Elantach überreden kann, wenn ihr gestattet wird, mit ihnen zu sprechen.
languages.original_text: The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their kin to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is certain that she can convince them to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

traits.locale_text: Nach den jüngsten Verlusten ihrer Brüder haben die Aeldari Angst vor den Chem-Pan-Sey und empfinden Abscheu für sie. Sie weigern sich daher, eingehende Rufe beantworten. Dennoch ist Yrliet überzeugt, dass sie ihre Verwandten zu einer Kooperation mit dem Elantach überreden kann, wenn ihr gestattet wird, mit ihnen zu sprechen.

languages.text: Les Aeldaris sont trop effrayés et ulcérés par la mort récente de leurs frères aux mains des mon-keigh pour répondre aux appels. Malgré tout, Yrliet pense pouvoir convaincre ses congénères de coopérer avec l'elantach pour peu que {mf|ce dernier|cette dernière} l'autorise à leur parler.
languages.original_text: The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their kin to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is certain that she can convince them to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.

traits.locale_text: Les Aeldaris sont trop effrayés et ulcérés par la mort récente de leurs frères aux mains des mon-keigh pour répondre aux appels. Malgré tout, Yrliet pense pouvoir convaincre ses congénères de coopérer avec l'elantach pour peu que {mf|ce dernier|cette dernière} l'autorise à leur parler.

languages.text: Aeldariler, son zamanlarda halklarına yapılandan ötürü mon-keighlere olan korkuları ve öfkeleri yüzünden gelen çağrılara yanıt vermiyor. Buna rağmen Yrliet, onlarla konuşmasına izin verilirse onları elantach ile iş birliği yapmaya ikna edebileceğinden emin.
languages.original_text: The Aeldari are too scared and resentful of the mon-keigh for the recent deaths of their kin to answer incoming hails. Despite this, Yrliet is certain that she can convince them to cooperate with the elantach if she is allowed to speak with them.
